metadata.title: Gilani condoles demise of Nayyar BukhariÃ¢ÂÂs wife

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 03 (APP):Senate Chairman Yousaf Raza Gilani on Friday expressed profound grief and sorrow over the passing of the wife of former Senate Chairman Nayyar Hussain Bukhari. Gilani extended his heartfelt sympathies to the bereaved family in his condolence message. aIn this time of grief, we stand in solidarity with the grieving family,a he said. He prayed for the departed soul, asking Allah Almighty to grant her a high place in Jannat-ul-Firdaus and to bestow patience and strength upon the family to bear this irreparable loss. aMay Allah give the mourning family the strength and courage to endure this tragedy,a he added.
content.summary: Yousaf Raza Gilani expressed his grief over the death of Nayyar Hussain Bukhari's wife. Gilani offered condolences and prayed for the departed soul, asking for patience for the family.
